summary: A comedy that follows a naive taxi driver (Quercia) who is duped by most of his fares.
cast: Boris Quercia|Angie Jibaja|Rhandy Piñango|Tamara Acosta|Diego Hurtado|Daniel Vilches|Ernesto Belloni|César Goldi
keywords: person in a car trunk|taxi driver|airport|santiago chile|chile
title: El rey de los huevones
